titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 2642) to facilitate and implement the settlement of Colorado Ute Indian reserved water rights claims in southwest Colorado, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-986.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2642 (Colorado Ute Indian water rights claims).
